en: This kind of picture does not appeal to me.
zh: 这种图片对我没有吸引力。

en: Such manuals should be written in simpler language.
zh: 这些手册应该用更简单的语言编写。

en: Those impossible suggestions just annoy me.
zh: 那些不可能的建议只会让我恼火。

en: This is how it stands.
zh: 情况就是这样。

en: Under these circumstances, I cannot accept the offer.
zh: 在这种情况下，我无法接受这个提议。

en: As such is the case, I am sorry I can't accept your kind invitation.
zh: 既然如此，很抱歉我不能接受您的盛情邀请。

en: This is the kind of job you should do all at once.
zh: 这种工作你应该一次性完成。

en: Such conduct is beneath your dignity.
zh: 这种行为有损你的尊严。

en: That's the mind-set of a previous time. The current generation doesn't think that way.
zh: 那是过去时代的想法了。现在的年轻人不这么想。

en: In spite of these dangers, mountaineering is very popular.
zh: 尽管有这些危险，登山运动仍然非常受欢迎。

en: This sort of music is not to the taste of everybody.
zh: 这种音乐不是每个人都喜欢的。

en: I doubt these generalizations.
zh: 我怀疑这些概括性的说法。

en: He is not alone in this opinion.
zh: 持有这种观点的人不止他一个。

en: This is why she is still angry with me.
zh: 这就是她还在生我气的原因。

en: This is why they left for America yesterday.
zh: 这就是他们昨天离开去美国的原因。

en: This is why he got angry with you.
zh: 这就是他生你气的原因。

en: This is why I fired him.
zh: 这就是我解雇他的原因。

en: This is way I am refusing the offer.
zh: 这就是我拒绝这个提议的原因。

en: This is the reason why I came here.
zh: 这就是我来这里的原因。

en: This is the reason I disagree with you.
zh: 这就是我不同意你的原因。

en: This is why birds like the pigeon or the Arctic tern can find their way around the world.
zh: 这就是为什么像鸽子或北极燕鸥这样的鸟类能在世界各地找到方向的原因。

en: This was why he entered the university.
zh: 这就是他进入大学的原因。

en: This is the very reason why I take no interest in art.
zh: 这正是我对艺术不感兴趣的原因。

en: This is how he smiled at me.
zh: 他就是这样对我笑的。

en: Am I correct in thinking thus?
zh: 我这样想对吗？

en: This is the way I solved the problem.
zh: 这就是我解决问题的方法。

en: For you who love adventure, this kind of hiking will meet your need.
zh: 对于热爱冒险的你来说，这种徒步旅行会满足你的需求。

en: I expect this is your first time for this.
zh: 我想这是你第一次做这个吧。

en: It may not appeal to some, but I prefer to remain a salaried man; I don't have to worry so much about making both ends meet.
zh: 这可能不吸引一些人，但我更喜欢保持工薪阶层；我不用太担心收支平衡。

en: You'd better check these points.
zh: 你最好检查一下这些要点。

en: Statesmen of this kind are hard to find.
zh: 这种政治家很难找到。

en: That type of person is dull.
zh: 那种人很无聊。

en: All these things serve to add to our happiness.
zh: 所有这些都增加了我们的幸福感。

en: Will you pick up the laundry from the laundrette?
zh: 你能从自助洗衣店取回洗好的衣服吗？

en: One side of a coin is called 'heads' and the other side is called 'tails'.
zh: 硬币的一面叫做“正面”，另一面叫做“反面”。

en: Let's toss up for it.
zh: 我们掷硬币决定吧。

en: Here's a fine how-do-you-do.
zh: 真是糟糕透了。

en: Who's this nobody?
zh: 这个无名小卒是谁？

en: Would you dine with me?
zh: 你愿意和我一起用餐吗？

en: Come on, I will beat you.
zh: 来吧，我会打败你的。

en: Koalas are more popular than kangaroos.
zh: 考拉比袋鼠更受欢迎。

en: The koala is an animal peculiar to Australia.
zh: 考拉是澳大利亚特有的动物。

en: Koalas can only be seen in Australia.
zh: 只能在澳大利亚看到考拉。

en: You find koalas in Australia.
zh: 你可以在澳大利亚找到考拉。

en: What's Ken doing now?
zh: Ken现在在做什么？

en: Ken easily cleared the fence.
zh: Ken轻松地跳过了栅栏。

en: Both Ken and Meg are my friends.
zh: Ken和Meg都是我的朋友。

en: The train for Cambridge leaves from Platform 5.
zh: 去剑桥的火车从5号站台出发。

en: Passengers for Cambridge, please make your way to platform No.6.
zh: 前往剑桥的乘客，请前往6号站台。

en: Ken stopped talking and began to eat.
zh: Ken停止说话，开始吃饭。

en: Ken joined the baseball club.
zh: Ken加入了棒球俱乐部。

en: Ken folded the blanket in half.
zh: Ken把毯子对折了。

en: Ken calls me every day.
zh: Ken每天都给我打电话。

en: Ken goes swimming day after day.
zh: 肯日复一日地去游泳。

en: Ken makes his own bed every morning.
zh: 肯每天早上都自己整理床铺。

en: Ken laid aside some money each week.
zh: 肯每周都存一些钱。

en: Ken is busy now, isn't he?
zh: 肯现在很忙，不是吗？

en: Ken jumped over the wall.
zh: 肯跳过了墙。

en: Ken put on his clothes.
zh: 肯穿上了他的衣服。

en: Ken always stands up for his mom when his parents quarrel.
zh: 肯的父母吵架时，他总是支持他的妈妈。

en: Ken bought a fine wine for his father on his birthday.
zh: 肯在他父亲生日那天给他买了一瓶好酒。

en: Ken will be invited to the party by her.
zh: 肯会被她邀请去参加聚会。

en: Ken couldn't recall his name.
zh: 肯想不起来他的名字了。

en: Ken inquired about his father.
zh: 肯打听了他父亲的情况。

en: Ken will grow into his brother's clothes by the end of the year.
zh: 到年底，肯就能穿他哥哥的衣服了。

en: Ken didn't work hard enough, so he failed the exam.
zh: 肯不够努力，所以他考试不及格。

en: Ken is an eager student.
zh: 肯是一个渴望学习的学生。

en: Ken learned many Japanese songs by heart.
zh: 肯用心记住了许多日语歌曲。

en: Ken complained of a headache.
zh: 肯抱怨头疼。

en: Ken is waiting for the arrival of the train.
zh: 肯正在等待火车的到来。

en: Ken will be at home until noon.
zh: 肯会在家待到中午。

en: Ken cried for help.
zh: 肯呼救。

en: Ken must run fast.
zh: 肯必须跑快点。

en: Ken wasn't running.
zh: 肯当时没有跑步。

en: Ken makes it a rule to get up early.
zh: 肯规定自己要早起。

en: Ken appears a friendly person.
zh: 肯看起来是个友善的人。

en: Ken walked on crutches.
zh: 肯拄着拐杖走路。

en: Ken told his dog to wait there.
zh: 肯让他的狗在那里等着。

en: Ken wants a bicycle.
zh: 肯想要一辆自行车。

en: Ken painted his bicycle white.
zh: 肯把他的自行车漆成了白色。

en: Ken took the examination with confidence.
zh: 肯充满信心地参加了考试。

en: Ken was worried about the exam and everything.
zh: 肯担心考试和一切。

en: Ken sat next to me.
zh: 肯坐在我旁边。

en: He has several times as many books as I.
zh: 他的书比我多好几倍。

en: Ken was running beside me.
zh: 肯在我旁边跑。

en: Ken lets his children have their own way, so they stay up late at night.
zh: 肯让他的孩子们随心所欲，所以他们熬夜到很晚。

en: Ken runs fastest of the three.
zh: 肯是他们三个人中跑得最快的。

en: Ken studied English last night.
zh: 肯昨晚学习了英语。

en: Was Ken at home yesterday?
zh: 肯昨天在家吗？

en: Ken called on his teacher yesterday.
zh: 肯昨天拜访了他的老师。

en: Ken dashed up the slope.
zh: 肯冲上了斜坡。

en: Ken dare not try again.
zh: 肯不敢再试一次。

en: Ken went as far as Aomori this summer.
zh: 今年夏天肯最远去了青森。

en: Ken laid down his arms.
zh: 肯放下了武器。

en: Ken is happy.
zh: 肯很高兴。

en: Ken collects old coins.
zh: 肯收集旧硬币。

en: Ken shared the room with his elder brother.
zh: 肯和他哥哥合住一个房间。

en: Ken has more books than you.
zh: 肯的书比你多。

en: Ken took the wrong bus by mistake.
zh: 肯不小心坐错了公交车。

en: Ken has made it.
zh: 肯成功了。

en: Ken decided on going abroad.
zh: 肯决定出国。

en: Ken met her on his way home.
zh: 肯在回家的路上遇到了她。

en: What is Ken eating?
zh: 肯在吃什么？

en: Ken likes music very much.
zh: 肯非常喜欢音乐。

en: Ken has no more than ten books.
zh: 肯的书不超过十本。

en: Ken is good at swimming.
zh: 肯擅长游泳。

en: Ken talks as if he knew everything.
zh: 肯说话好像什么都知道似的。

en: Ken seems to have a terrible cold.
zh: 肯好像得了重感冒。

en: Ken has never been to New York.
zh: 肯从来没去过纽约。

en: Ken goes to school by bus.
zh: 肯乘公共汽车去上学。

en: How long has Ken lived in Kobe?
zh: 肯在神户住了多久了？

en: No matter what I did, Ken wouldn't do what I told him.
zh: 无论我做什么，肯都不会按我说的做。

en: Does Ken play tennis?
zh: 肯打网球吗？

en: Ken beat me at chess.
zh: 肯下棋赢了我。

en: Ken was running at that time.
zh: 那时肯正在跑步。

en: Ken saved his face by passing the examination.
zh: 肯通过考试保住了面子。

en: Ken kept on singing that song.
zh: 肯不停地唱那首歌。

en: Ken was fined 7,000 yen for speeding.
zh: 肯因超速被罚款7000日元。

en: Ken is not the type of person who loses his temper easily.
zh: 肯不是那种容易发脾气的人。

en: Ken put his shirt on inside out.
zh: 肯把衬衫穿反了。

en: Ken is busy this afternoon.
zh: 肯今天下午很忙。

en: Ken likes camping.
zh: 肯喜欢露营。

en: Ken has a guitar.
zh: 肯有一把吉他。

en: Ken hit on a good idea.
zh: 肯想出了一个好主意。

en: Ken runs faster than you.
zh: 肯比你跑得快。

en: Ken is going to the United States at the end of July.
zh: 肯将在七月底去美国。

en: Ken's father loved Ken all the more because he was his only son.
zh: 肯的父亲因为肯是他的独生子而更加爱他。

en: Ken is older than Seiko.
zh: 肯比圣子年长。

en: Ken must be home by now.
zh: 健现在肯定到家了。

en: Ken has arrived in Kyoto.
zh: 健已经到达京都了。

en: Ken wishes to brush up his English.
zh: 健希望提高他的英语水平。

en: Ken mistook you for me.
zh: 健把你错认成我了。

en: Ken can play the violin, not to mention the guitar.
zh: 健会拉小提琴，更不用说弹吉他了。

en: Ken's talks always appeal to us.
zh: 健的谈话总是很吸引我们。

en: Ken's story was as follows.
zh: 健的故事如下。

en: Ken's careless driving has caused his mother great anxiety.
zh: 健粗心的驾驶使他的母亲非常焦虑。

en: Ken's uncle has a big chicken farm.
zh: 健的叔叔有个很大的养鸡场。

en: Ken's turn came.
zh: 轮到健了。

en: Ken's team will win nine cases out of ten.
zh: 健的团队十有八九会赢九场官司。

en: Shall I call Ken back?
zh: 我要给健回电话吗？

en: The girl walking with Ken is May.
zh: 和健一起散步的女孩是小梅。

en: Ken and his brother are very much alike.
zh: 健和他的兄弟非常相像。

en: Which is taller, Ken or Taro?
zh: 健和太郎谁更高？

en: Can I go on a date with Ken, Mom?
zh: 妈妈，我可以和健约会吗？

en: Did you have a fight with Ken?
zh: 你和健吵架了吗？

en: It is no wonder to me that Gendou has something to do with.
zh: 源堂和这件事有关，我一点也不奇怪。

en: I met a tall man named Ken.
zh: 我遇到了一个名叫健的高个子男人。

en: Kentaro was tired and moreover his car's engine had got hot so he stopped driving.
zh: 健太郎很累，而且他的汽车引擎也过热了，所以他停了下来。

en: Ken climbed down from the tree.
zh: 健从树上爬了下来。

en: Are you on the level, Ken?
zh: 健，你说的是真的吗？

en: Ken stands on the diving board.
zh: 健站在跳板上。

en: It was just two weeks ago that Ken came to see me.
zh: 就在两周前，健来看我了。

en: The desk which Ken uses is old.
zh: 健用的桌子很旧了。

en: It is today that Ken gets married.
zh: 今天肯结婚。

en: Unless you stop fighting, I'll call the police.
zh: 除非你们停止争吵，否则我就报警了。

en: It takes two to make a quarrel.
zh: 一个巴掌拍不响。

en: It is strange for Ken not to agree with us.
zh: 肯竟然不同意我们的意见，这很奇怪。

en: Ken lighted the candles.
zh: 肯点燃了蜡烛。

en: Ken has been looking for you.
zh: 肯一直在找你。

en: Ken came up to me.
zh: 肯朝我走来。

en: Do you have the time to run over the draft of my speech, Ken?
zh: 肯，你有没有时间帮我过一遍我的演讲稿？

en: It's high time you went to bed, Ken.
zh: 肯，你早该睡觉了。

en: Be on your guard against pickpockets, Ken.
zh: 肯，小心扒手。

en: But he suddenly felt dizzy and he sat down again in his old chair.
zh: 但他突然感到头晕，又坐回了他的旧椅子上。

en: But something has gone wrong.
zh: 但是出问题了。

en: Managers like Paula Grayson, however, are trying to persuade them to change their habits.
zh: 然而，像保拉·格雷森这样的管理者正试图说服他们改变习惯。

en: Pam doesn't use the word "drive", however.
zh: 然而，帕姆不使用“drive”这个词。

en: Kelly has an eye for good English.
zh: 凯利对好的英语很有眼光。

en: Kelly carries the news department.
zh: 凯利负责新闻部门。

en: Kelly eats like a horse.
zh: 凯利吃得像匹马一样。

en: Kelly cut physical education and went home.
zh: 凯利逃了体育课回家了。

en: Kelly struck a match and put it to his pipe.
zh: 凯利划着一根火柴点燃了他的烟斗。

en: Kelly worked until he dropped.
zh: 凯利工作到筋疲力尽。

en: Kelly brought the matter to light.
zh: 凯利把这件事公之于众。

en: Kelly cleared his throat and begin to speak.
zh: 凯利清了清嗓子，开始说话。

en: Kelly's voice carries well.
zh: 凯利的声音很洪亮。

en: Kelly's latest book appeared last week.
zh: 凯利最新的一本书上周出版了。

en: Kelly will appear on TV.
zh: 凯利将出现在电视上。

en: Kerry's on TV!
zh: 克里在电视上呢！

en: Kevin has bought a diamond ring and is going to pop the question to Kim tonight.
zh: 凯文买了一枚钻戒，今晚要向金求婚。

en: Kevin gave up the idea of going to Canada.
zh: 凯文放弃了去加拿大的想法。

en: Kevin was brought up by his aunt in the country.
zh: 凯文是乡下的姑妈带大的。

en: Nobody believed Kevin because all he ever told were tall stories.
zh: 没人相信凯文，因为他说的全是谎话。

en: Stick to jackets that aren't too gaudy.
zh: 选择不要太花哨的夹克。

en: Dressed in a loud and peculiar outfit, she stood out in the crowd.
zh: 她穿着一套花哨而奇特的服装，在人群中脱颖而出。

en: Mr Kennedy pointed out our mistakes.
zh: 肯尼迪先生指出了我们的错误。

en: Kennedy Airport, please.
zh: 肯尼迪机场，麻烦了。

en: President Kennedy was killed, but his legend will live on forever.
zh: 肯尼迪总统遇刺身亡，但他的传奇将永存。

en: Mr Kennedy was inaugurated as the President of the United States.
zh: 肯尼迪先生宣誓就任美国总统。

en: Kenneth Starr abused his power again and took away my right to get on-line.
zh: 肯尼斯·斯塔尔再次滥用职权，剥夺了我上网的权利。

en: Kenya used to be a British colony.
zh: 肯尼亚曾经是英国的殖民地。

en: I burp a lot.
zh: 我经常打嗝。

en: Kenya became independent in 1963.
zh: 肯尼亚于1963年独立。

en: I'm by no means angry with you.
zh: 我绝不是在生你的气。

en: Don't kick the door open.
zh: 不要把门踢开。

en: Never play here.
zh: 永远不要在这里玩。

en: The plan failed after all.
zh: 这个计划最终还是失败了。

en: Democracy will be victorious in the long run.
zh: 从长远来看，民主必将获胜。

en: We all know he was right after all.
zh: 我们都知道他最终是对的。

en: Real ability wins in the end.
zh: 真正的能力最终会获胜。

en: I made up my mind to come here after all.
zh: 我最终还是决定来这里。

en: I'd like to have ketchup on the side.
zh: 我想要一份番茄酱，另外放。

en: My grandmother posted the letter this morning.
zh: 我奶奶今天早上寄了信。

en: When I woke up this morning, the rain had turned into snow.
zh: 今天早上我醒来的时候，雨已经变成了雪。

en: It was raining heavily when I got up this morning.
zh: 今天早上我起床的时候，雨下得很大。

en: When I got up this morning, I had a headache.
zh: 今天早上我起床的时候，头很痛。

en: The dew fell this morning.
zh: 今天早上下了露水。

en: The train was late this morning.
zh: 今天早上火车晚点了。

en: I got up early this morning.
zh: 今天早上我起得很早。

en: Is there any mail for me this morning?
zh: 今天早上有我的邮件吗？

en: I don't feel like taking a walk this morning.
zh: 今天早上我不想去散步。

en: I'm being good to you this morning.
zh: 今天早上我对你很好。

en: Did you have to get up very early this morning?
zh: 你今天早上是不是起得很早？

en: You are very early this morning.
zh: 你今天早上真早。

en: I got up at six-thirty this morning.
zh: 今天早上我六点半起床。

en: I was able to solve the question this morning.
zh: 今天早上我解出了那道题。

en: The injured person wailed with pain after recovering from the anaesthesia.
zh: 伤者从麻醉中醒来后痛苦地哀号。

en: The injured man was carried to the hospital.
zh: 受伤的人被抬到医院。

en: Nobody was injured.
zh: 没有人受伤。

en: Though wounded, they continued to fight.
zh: 他们虽然受伤了，但仍然继续战斗。

en: Please show me your injured arm.
zh: 请给我看看你受伤的胳膊。

en: The injured were carried to the hospital, and the dead to the church.
zh: 伤者被抬到医院，死者被抬到教堂。

en: Some passengers were injured, but the others were safe.
zh: 一些乘客受伤了，但其他人是安全的。

en: The injured man cried for help.
zh: 受伤的人呼救。

en: Gary found an outlet for his energy in playing football.
zh: 加里在踢足球中找到了释放能量的途径。

en: As long as it doesn't interrupt the game!
zh: 只要不打断比赛就行！

en: John wins every time we play the game.
zh: 每次我们玩游戏，约翰都赢。

en: We amused ourselves by playing games.
zh: 我们通过玩游戏来消遣。

en: The game has been indefinitely postponed.
zh: 比赛已被无限期推迟。

en: A whistle is blown at the start of a game.
zh: 比赛开始时会吹哨。

en: How did you feel about the game?
zh: 你觉得这场比赛怎么样？

en: We hoped we'd be able to win the game.
zh: 我们希望我们能赢得比赛。

en: The game added to the fun.
zh: 这场比赛增添了乐趣。

en: I felt exhausted when the game was over.
zh: 比赛结束后我感到筋疲力尽。

en: I pay quite a sum of money for each game-cassette.
zh: 我为每盒游戏卡带支付相当多的钱。

en: Some students take the cable car.
zh: 一些学生乘坐缆车。

en: I'd like to ride the cable car, but I'm afraid of heights.
zh: 我想坐缆车，但我恐高。

en: From childhood I dreamed of being a pastry cook.
zh: 从小我就梦想成为一名糕点师。

en: I failed to make a cake.
zh: 我没能做出蛋糕。

en: She divided the cake between the two.
zh: 她把蛋糕分给了两个人。

en: It is no use looking for the cake; I already ate it.
zh: 找蛋糕没用了，我已经吃了。

en: Pharamp divided the cake into two.
zh: 电龙把蛋糕分成了两份。

en: Do not eat too much cake.
zh: 不要吃太多蛋糕。

en: You cannot eat your cake and have it too.
zh: 鱼与熊掌不可兼得。

en: You can't eat your cake and have it.
zh: 鱼与熊掌不可兼得。

en: You can't have your cake and eat it too.
zh: 鱼与熊掌不可兼得。

en: Will you eat a little cake?
zh: 你要吃点蛋糕吗？

en: In making a cake, you must use eggs, butter and sugar.
zh: 做蛋糕时，你必须使用鸡蛋、黄油和糖。

en: I need some sugar to make a cake.
zh: 我需要一些糖来做蛋糕。

en: I was making a cake.
zh: 我当时正在做蛋糕。

en: Please help yourself to more cake.
zh: 请随便多吃点蛋糕。

en: You have already eaten the cake.
zh: 你已经吃了蛋糕了。

en: Have you eaten the cake yet?
zh: 你吃过蛋糕了吗？

en: Would you care for some more cake?
zh: 您要不要再来点蛋糕？

en: Can I tempt you to try another piece of cake?
zh: 要不要再尝一块蛋糕？

en: Help yourself to the cake.
zh: 请随意吃蛋糕。

en: You have not eaten the cake yet.
zh: 你还没吃蛋糕呢。

en: Won't you have some cake?
zh: 你不来点蛋糕吗？

en: Divide the cake between you two.
zh: 你们两个分一下这块蛋糕。

en: How about another piece of cake?
zh: 再来一块蛋糕怎么样？

en: The cakes were still warm, and they all ate and drank.
zh: 蛋糕还热乎乎的，他们都吃喝起来。

en: Blend butter and flour before adding the other ingredients of the cake.
zh: 在加入蛋糕的其他配料之前，先把黄油和面粉混合。

en: You may take either half of the cake.
zh: 你可以拿走蛋糕的任何一半。

en: The cake was alive with ants.
zh: 蛋糕上爬满了蚂蚁。

en: There was an army of ants at the cake.
zh: 蛋糕旁边有一大群蚂蚁。

en: All of the cake is gone.
zh: 蛋糕全都没了。

en: It's my fault that the cake was burned. I was talking on the phone and didn't notice the time.
zh: 蛋糕烤焦是我的错。我当时在打电话，没注意到时间。

en: Some of the cake is left in the kitchen.
zh: 厨房里还剩下一些蛋糕。

en: There were two cakes. I ate one and then I ate the other.
zh: 有两块蛋糕。我吃了一块，然后又吃了另一块。

en: Cake? I'm suddenly hungry again.
zh: 蛋糕？我突然又饿了。

en: Professor Kay has been studying insects for forty years.
zh: 凯教授研究昆虫已经四十年了。

en: It was not until Kay received the doll that she stopped crying.
zh: 直到凯收到娃娃，她才停止哭泣。

en: Where can I find a good gay club?
zh: 哪里能找到好的同志酒吧？

en: Waiting for Kate, I saw Bob and Mary.
zh: 等凯特的时候，我看到了鲍勃和玛丽。

en: I think Kate is also a clever person.
zh: 我认为凯特也是个聪明的人。

en: Kate took careful notes on the history lecture.
zh: 凯特认真地记录了历史讲座的笔记。

en: Kate went to a party to see her friend.
zh: 凯特去参加聚会看她的朋友。

en: Kate drinks a lot of milk every day.
zh: 凯特每天都喝很多牛奶。

en: Kate has a cold.
zh: 凯特感冒了。

en: Kate must be sick, for she looks pale.
zh: 凯特一定是病了，因为她看起来很苍白。

en: Kate has very good features.
zh: 凯特五官很标致。

en: Kate was astonished by his behavior.
zh: 凯特对他的行为感到惊讶。

en: Kate sympathized with him.
zh: 凯特同情他。

en: Everyone says that Kate is a genius and will have a successful future.
zh: 大家都说凯特是个天才，将来会很成功。

en: Kate can hardly speak Chinese.
zh: 凯特几乎不会说中文。

en: Kate is dressing her doll.
zh: 凯特正在给她的娃娃穿衣服。

en: Kate stays in Izu over the weekend.
zh: 凯特周末待在伊豆。

en: Kate went to school with an umbrella, but Brian didn't.
zh: 凯特打着伞去上学了，但是布莱恩没有。

en: Kate always shows off the big diamond ring she got from her fiance.
zh: 凯特总是炫耀她未婚夫送给她的那枚大钻戒。

en: Kate is running in the field now.
zh: 凯特现在正在田野里跑步。

en: Kate keeps a dog.
zh: 凯特养了一条狗。

en: I found that Kate was wealthy.
zh: 我发现凯特很富有。

en: Kate absented herself from the meeting.
zh: 凯特缺席了会议。

en: Kate is looked up to by everybody.
zh: 凯特受到大家的尊敬。

en: Kate made her family leave home.
zh: 凯特让她的家人离开了家。

en: Kate has been given an opportunity to play a major role in a movie.
zh: 凯特得到了一个在电影中扮演重要角色的机会。

en: Kate listened to the radio all day.
zh: 凯特听了一整天的收音机。

en: Kate is crazy about the new singer who appears on television frequently.
zh: 凯特对经常出现在电视上的那位新歌手非常着迷。

en: With her pure voice, Kate shined outstandingly on the stage of a musical.
zh: 凯特凭借她纯净的嗓音，在音乐剧的舞台上大放异彩。

en: Hasn't Kate arrived yet?
zh: 凯特还没到吗？

en: Kate hardly ever celebrates her birthday.
zh: 凯特几乎从不庆祝她的生日。

en: Kate was surprised by Brian's story.
zh: 凯特对布莱恩的故事感到惊讶。

en: Kate talked over the picture with Brian.
zh: 凯特和布莱恩一起讨论了这张照片。

en: Kate came home by bus.
zh: 凯特坐公交车回家的。

en: How kind Kate is!
zh: 凯特真好！

en: Kate found the watch which she had lost.
zh: 凯特找到了她丢失的手表。

en: Kate is very charming.
zh: 凯特非常迷人。

en: Kate speaks English very fast.
zh: 凯特英语说得很快。

en: Kate is majoring in German.
zh: 凯特的专业是德语。

en: Kate spread the cloth over the table.
zh: 凯特把布铺在桌子上。

en: Kate tries to walk on tiptoe.
zh: 凯特试图踮起脚走路。

en: Kate glanced at Chris and then ignored him, making him feel miserable.
zh: 凯特瞥了克里斯一眼，然后不理他，让他感到很沮丧。

en: Kate was made to read the book.
zh: 凯特被迫读了这本书。

en: Kate was frightened to see the big dog.
zh: 凯特看到大狗很害怕。

en: Kate has three times as many records as Jane has.
zh: 凯特的唱片数量是简的三倍。

en: Kate knows how to make a cake.
zh: 凯特知道怎么做蛋糕。

en: Kate is smarter than any other student in our class.
zh: 凯特比我们班上任何其他学生都聪明。

en: Kate captured the hearts of her classmates.
zh: 凯特赢得了她同学的心。

en: Kate is smarter than any other student in our class is.
zh: 凯特比我们班上任何其他学生都聪明。

en: Kate is the smartest student in our class.
zh: 凯特是我们班上最聪明的学生。

en: Kate is the best singer in my class.
zh: 凯特是我们班上最好的歌手。

en: Kate ran to my father's restaurant.
zh: 凯特跑到我父亲的餐馆。

en: Kate got some money from her father.
zh: 凯特从她父亲那里得到了一些钱。

en: Kate is no less charming than her sister is.
zh: 凯特和她的姐姐一样迷人。

en: Kate always shows off her diamond ring.
zh: 凯特总是炫耀她的钻石戒指。

en: Kate is not as tall as Anne.
zh: 凯特没有安妮高。

en: Kate isn't popular among her classmates because she always tries to have her own way.
zh: 凯特在她的同学中不受欢迎，因为她总是想按自己的方式行事。

en: Kate made an apple pie.
zh: 凯特做了一个苹果派。

en: Kate came at five sharp.
zh: 凯特五点整准时到的。

en: Kate wants to finish her homework by ten.
zh: 凯特想在十点前完成作业。

en: Kate left this place for good.
zh: 凯特永远地离开了这个地方。

en: Kate's father walks home from the station.
zh: 凯特的父亲从车站走回家。

en: Kate has a good figure.
zh: 凯特身材很好。

en: Kate's voice is clearly different from the other girls'.
zh: 凯特的声音明显和其他女孩不一样。

en: I'll take them to Kate.
zh: 我把它们拿给凯特。

en: Kate's dog was barking at Brian at the gate at noon.
zh: 中午，凯特的狗在门口对着布莱恩叫。

en: Kate's wish is to prove that she is a worthy actress.
zh: 凯特的愿望是证明她是一个有价值的女演员。

en: Kate's father is about the house.
zh: 凯特的父亲就在房子附近。

en: Could you bring this flower to Kate?
zh: 你能把这朵花带给凯特吗？

en: Kate was lying with her eyes open.
zh: 凯特睁着眼睛躺着。

en: A girl named Kate came to see you.
zh: 有个叫凯特的女孩来找你。

en: Kate may well complain of her husband.
zh: 凯特很可能会抱怨她的丈夫。

en: Kate broke his heart by rudely demanding he go away.
zh: 凯特粗鲁地要求他离开，伤了他的心。

en: Chris noticed Kate walking through the neighborhood with a strange boy.
zh: 克里斯注意到凯特和一个陌生的男孩走过社区。

en: Nothing could hinder Kate from using all her energy to polish her performances.
zh: 没有什么能阻止凯特用她所有的精力来打磨她的表演。

en: From Kate's point of view, he works too much.
zh: 在凯特看来，他工作太努力了。

en: I found Kate more active than her brother.
zh: 我发现凯特比她的哥哥更活跃。

en: When Kate played a minor part in a movie, her acting was criticized.
zh: 当凯特在一部电影中扮演一个小角色时，她的演技受到了批评。

en: Keisuke is taller than I.
zh: 圭佑比我高。

en: There's a Mr Kay wants to see you.
zh: 有位凯先生想见你。

en: Keiko is kind, isn't she?
zh: 惠子很善良，不是吗？

en: Keiko informed me of the arrival of his plane.
zh: 惠子通知我他的飞机到达了。

en: Gary will have been in Japan for six years next month.
zh: 下个月加里在日本就满六年了。

en: Gerhard Schroeder is the first German chancellor not to have lived through World War II.
zh: 格哈德·施罗德是第一位没有经历过第二次世界大战的德国总理。

en: Gloria was easily the best singer of that evening.
zh: 格洛丽亚绝对是那天晚上最好的歌手。

en: The crocus is a forerunner of spring.
zh: 番红花是春天的先驱。

en: Croquet players must wear white clothing during play.
zh: 槌球运动员在比赛时必须穿白色服装。

en: Can you do the crawl?
zh: 你会自由泳吗？

en: Gloria, don't let him feed you that line about his wife not understanding him.
zh: 格洛丽亚，别让他用他妻子不理解他的那套话来骗你。

en: The cleanser removed the dirt from the oven.
zh: 清洁剂去除了烤箱里的污垢。

en: I am sure that Greg is going to follow in his father's footsteps.
zh: 我确信格雷格会追随他父亲的脚步。

en: Credit is an amount or limit to the extent of which a person may receive goods or money for payment in the future.
zh: 信用是指一个人在未来可以获得商品或金钱用于支付的金额或限额。

en: Credit is the amount or sum placed at a person's disposal by a bank; a loan of money.
zh: 信用是银行提供给某人支配的金额或总额；一笔贷款。

en: Can I pay on credit?
zh: 我可以赊账吗？

en: Credit card companies are not looking so hard at credit ratings.
zh: 信用卡公司现在不太注重信用评级了。

en: I'm calling because my credit card has been stolen.
zh: 我打电话是因为我的信用卡被偷了。

en: It's easy to get into debt quickly with charge cards.
zh: 使用信用卡很容易迅速陷入债务。

en: Your credit card, please.
zh: 请出示您的信用卡。

en: I'm calling because I've lost my credit card.
zh: 我打电话是因为我丢失了我的信用卡。

en: Credit cards are useful but dangerous.
zh: 信用卡很有用，但也危险。

en: Where are your credit cards?
zh: 你的信用卡在哪里？

en: Do you have a credit card?
zh: 你有信用卡吗？

en: It makes sense to pay off your credit card balance every month.
zh: 每个月还清你的信用卡余额是有意义的。

en: I'd like to pay by credit card.
zh: 我想用信用卡支付。

en: Please pay cash, not by credit card.
zh: 请付现金，不要用信用卡。

en: Grace goes to phone extension upstairs.
zh: 格蕾丝到楼上的分机接电话。

en: Do you know if Grace is at home?
zh: 你知道格蕾丝在家吗？

en: Grace has not come yet.
zh: 格蕾丝还没来。

en: Mr Grey did not enjoy his job.
zh: 格雷先生不喜欢他的工作。

en: Miss Gray told the boy to hold his tongue while she was speaking.
zh: 格雷小姐让那个男孩在她说话的时候闭嘴。

en: Would you like some more gravy?
zh: 您要再来点肉汁吗？

en: Grace wore an indignant look.
zh: 格蕾丝一脸愤慨。

en: How fast Greyhound buses run!
zh: 灰狗巴士跑得真快！

en: Graham Greene is my favorite author.
zh: 格雷厄姆·格林是我最喜欢的作家。

en: All the days went by, one like another.
zh: 日子一天天过去，每天都一样。

en: It was good to feel like one of the group, because my blond hair and 185 cm height already made me stand out.
zh: 能感觉到自己是集体中的一员真好，因为我的金发和185厘米的身高已经让我很显眼了。

en: When all the group members are silent, somebody must break the ice.
zh: 当所有小组成员都沉默时，必须有人打破僵局。

en: Clint Eastwood was elected mayor of Carmel.
zh: 克林特·伊斯特伍德当选为卡梅尔市市长。

en: Clint Eastwood's latest movie is on at the theater.
zh: 克林特·伊斯特伍德的最新电影正在影院上映。

en: Greenwich Village is a place which especially attracts the young.
zh: 格林威治村是一个特别吸引年轻人的地方。

en: I've put on a lot of weight since Christmas.
zh: 自从圣诞节以来，我体重增加了很多。

en: With Christmas just around the corner, I should do some shopping.
zh: 圣诞节就要到了，我应该去购物了。

en: Tom broke his right leg and was taken to hospital a few weeks before Christmas.
zh: 汤姆在圣诞节前几周摔断了右腿，被送往医院。

en: How many days are there before Christmas?
zh: 距离圣诞节还有多少天？

en: Could you wrap it in Christmas wrapping?
zh: 你能用圣诞包装纸包起来吗？

en: Christmas is a special holiday.
zh: 圣诞节是一个特殊的节日。

en: Christmas comes a few days before New Year.
zh: 圣诞节在新年前几天到来。

en: Christmas is a good time to market new toys.
zh: 圣诞节是推销新玩具的好时机。

en: Christmas is near at hand, isn't it?
zh: 圣诞节快到了，不是吗？

en: Christmas is just around the corner.
zh: 圣诞节就要到了。

en: Christmas is near at hand.
zh: 圣诞节快到了。

en: Christmas is only two weeks off.
zh: 距离圣诞节只有两周了。

en: We stayed in Hawaii over Christmas.
zh: 我们在夏威夷度过了圣诞节。

en: Christmas Day is December 25th.
zh: 圣诞节是12月25日。

en: On Christmas day, Tom still had his right leg in plaster.
zh: 圣诞节那天，汤姆的右腿还打着石膏。

en: Trang gave an unusually expensive Christmas gift to Sysko.
zh: 庄给Sysko送了一份异常昂贵的圣诞礼物。

en: Book your flight early as it fills up quickly during Christmas.
zh: 尽早预订机票，因为圣诞节期间很快就会订满。

en: Can I reserve a seat to Hawaii for Christmas?
zh: 我可以预订圣诞节去夏威夷的座位吗？

en: It's doubtful if we'll finish in time for Christmas.
zh: 我们是否能及时完成圣诞节前的工作，这令人怀疑。

en: What did you get for Christmas?
zh: 你圣诞节收到了什么？

en: What do you want for Christmas, Jenny?
zh: 珍妮，你圣诞节想要什么？

en: I look forward to seeing you at Christmas.
zh: 我期待在圣诞节见到你。

en: I think I have to go back on a diet after Christmas.
zh: 我想圣诞节后我必须重新开始节食。

en: With the approach of Christmas, business improved somewhat.
zh: 随着圣诞节的临近，生意有所好转。

en: Christmas is fast approaching.
zh: 圣诞节快到了。

en: I wish you a Merry Christmas.
zh: 祝你圣诞快乐。

en: It's dangerous to tell Chris your secrets because he tells everybody.
zh: 告诉克里斯你的秘密是很危险的，因为他会告诉所有人。

en: Chris was confident that Beth would be delighted with his improvement.
zh: 克里斯确信贝丝会很高兴看到他的进步。

en: Chris does not appreciate how Beth lost the clock he lent her.
zh: 克里斯不欣赏贝丝弄丢了他借给她的钟。

en: Chris is in a risky situation in science class.
zh: 克里斯在科学课上处于危险境地。

en: Chris was hired to paint houses and was able to raise the money.
zh: 克里斯被雇来粉刷房屋，并能够筹集到资金。

en: Chris didn't have a car.
zh: 克里斯没有车。

en: Chris brought her a present and bravely gave it to her.
zh: 克里斯给她带了一份礼物，并勇敢地送给了她。

en: Chris is very attractive and wealthy, but not very modest.
zh: 克里斯非常迷人且富有，但不是很谦虚。

en: Chris is very anxious to go to college.
zh: 克里斯非常渴望上大学。

en: Chris' heart felt so empty and damaged that it couldn't be repaired.
zh: 克里斯的心感到如此空虚和受伤，以至于无法修复。

en: What happened to Chris? We don't see her these days.
zh: 克里斯怎么了？我们最近都没见到她。

en: Chris injured his leg playing tennis and is in a lot of pain.
zh: 克里斯打网球时腿受伤了，非常痛苦。

en: Chris got a remarkable grade for the complex homework.
zh: 克里斯的复杂作业得到了一个非常好的分数。

en: Chris recognized the boy from his math class and became very jealous.
zh: 克里斯认出那个男孩是他数学课上的同学，并且变得非常嫉妒。

en: Chris saw his favorite girl, Kate, having a private conversation with Beth.
zh: 克里斯看到他最喜欢的女孩凯特正在和贝丝私下谈话。

en: Chris followed the two and cheerfully greeted Kate.
zh: 克里斯跟着她们，并兴高采烈地向凯特打招呼。

en: Chris cannot control his passion for the lovely new girl in town.
zh: 克里斯无法控制他对镇上可爱的新女孩的激情。

en: Brian is mad because Chris obviously does not intend to return the money.
zh: 布莱恩很生气，因为克里斯显然不打算还钱。

en: Christine stayed in the shade all day, because she didn't want to get a sunburn.
zh: 克里斯汀一整天都待在阴凉处，因为她不想被晒伤。

en: Christi's mysteries are most decidedly interesting.
zh: 克里斯蒂的谜团绝对非常有趣。

en: Chris can't work tomorrow.
zh: 克里斯明天不能工作。

en: Brian was grateful when Chris delivered the money on the weekend.
zh: 当克里斯在周末还钱时，布莱恩很感激。

en: The money that Chris has not paid back adds up to a large sum.
zh: 克里斯没有偿还的钱加起来是一大笔数目。

en: My head starts to hurt when I think about how annoying Chris is.
zh: 每当我想到克里斯有多烦人时，我就开始头疼。

en: Beth will not allow Chris to kiss her because he is terribly dirty.
zh: 贝丝不会让克里斯亲她，因为他太脏了。

en: When Chris suggested going out, she managed to politely say no.
zh: 当克里斯提议出去时，她设法礼貌地拒绝了。

en: I should like to join the cricket club.
zh: 我想加入板球俱乐部。

en: Mrs. Green, from whom my children have lessons in singing, is to have a recital next Sunday.
zh: 格林夫人教我的孩子们唱歌，她将于下周日举行独奏会。

en: Mr Green is anything but a good teacher.
zh: 格林先生绝对不是一个好老师。

en: Miss Green teaches us music.
zh: 格林小姐教我们音乐。

en: Miss Green asked two questions of me.
zh: 格林小姐问了我两个问题。

en: Mr Green keeps a little dog.
zh: 格林先生养了一条小狗。

en: Miss Green taught me English.
zh: 格林小姐教我英语。

en: How far is it to the green?
zh: 到绿地有多远？

en: Greenpeace is fighting an uphill battle to save the environment.
zh: 绿色和平组织正在为拯救环境而进行一场艰苦的斗争。

en: Mr Green is a teacher of history.
zh: 格林先生是一位历史老师。

en: Green doesn't go with red.
zh: 绿色和红色不搭配。

en: Try to be as polite as you can before Mr Green.
zh: 在格林先生面前，尽量礼貌一些。

en: Do you know a certain Mr. Green?
zh: 你认识一位格林先生吗？

en: Mr Green, you are wanted on the phone.
zh: 格林先生，有您的电话。

en: We have run out of cream.
zh: 我们的奶油用完了。

en: May I have a cup of coffee with cream and sugar?
zh: 我可以要一杯加奶油和糖的咖啡吗？

en: Coffee, please, with cream and sugar.
zh: 请来一杯咖啡，加奶油和糖。

en: Would you pass me the cream cheese, please?
zh: 请把奶油奶酪递给我好吗？

en: Please pick up my dry cleaning.
zh: 请帮我取一下干洗的衣服。

en: Do you have laundry service?
zh: 你们提供洗衣服务吗？

en: Is it possible to send mourning clothes to the cleaner?
zh: 可以把丧服送到洗衣店吗？

en: I'm a member of the glee club.
zh: 我是合唱团的成员。

en: Winning the Grand Prix was a feather in the cap of the famous drivers.
zh: 赢得大奖赛是著名车手们的荣耀。

en: Where's the bus stop for Grand Hotel?
zh: 去格兰德酒店的巴士站在哪里？

en: Could you take me to the Grand Hotel?
zh: 你能送我去格兰德酒店吗？

en: The playground is divided into three areas by white lines.
zh: 操场被白线分成三个区域。

en: Grand Central Station, please.
zh: 请到中央车站。

en: The Grand Canyon is one of the most popular places in the USA.
zh: 大峡谷是美国最受欢迎的景点之一。

en: Clara is doing quite a job.
zh: 克拉拉做得相当出色。

en: Clara's lack of responsibility drives me mad.
zh: 克拉拉缺乏责任感让我很生气。

en: Is there practice every day?
zh: 每天都有练习吗？

en: Each and every member of the club was present.
zh: 俱乐部的每一位成员都出席了。

en: Every member of the club was present.
zh: 俱乐部的每一位成员都出席了。

en: I went camping in the Japan Alps with my club.
zh: 我和俱乐部一起去日本阿尔卑斯山露营。

en: If you keep breaking the club rules, you'll get thrown out.
zh: 如果你一直违反俱乐部规定，你会被开除的。

en: You must observe the rules of the club.
zh: 你必须遵守俱乐部的规定。

en: Mr Johnson, president of the club, will soon come.
zh: 俱乐部主席约翰逊先生很快就会来。

en: The club members assembled in the meeting room.
zh: 俱乐部成员在会议室集合。

en: Only members of the club are entitled to use this room.
zh: 只有俱乐部成员才有权使用这个房间。

en: All the members of the club agreed with me.
zh: 俱乐部所有成员都同意我的看法。

en: There are 50 members in the club.
zh: 俱乐部有50名成员。

en: Will you join our club?
zh: 你愿意加入我们的俱乐部吗？

en: Those who want to join the club should sign here.
zh: 想加入俱乐部的人请在这里签名。

en: There is a training camp with the club.
zh: 俱乐部有一个训练营。

en: The whole class burst into laughter at the teacher's joke.
zh: 全班同学被老师的笑话逗得哄堂大笑。

en: The whole class was quiet.
zh: 全班都很安静。

en: All the class waited for the new teacher.
zh: 全班都在等新老师。

en: The whole class passed the test.
zh: 全班都通过了考试。

en: There were twelve of us in all at our class reunion.
zh: 我们班级聚会总共有十二个人。

en: You can't treat the class as a whole, but must pay attention to each member.
zh: 你不能把班级看作一个整体，而必须关注每个成员。

en: I broke a glass.
zh: 我打碎了一个玻璃杯。

en: To control a class calls for all your skills as a teacher.
zh: 要控制一个班级需要你所有的教师技能。

en: Fill the glass to the brim.
zh: 把杯子倒满。

en: Don't play around with the glass.
zh: 别玩玻璃杯。

en: Don't speak ill of your classmates.
zh: 不要说你同学的坏话。

en: All of the classmates waited for Takeshi.
zh: 所有的同学们都在等武。

en: Some classmates saw me give him chocolate.
zh: 一些同学看到我给他巧克力。

en: The glass shattered into pieces.
zh: 玻璃杯摔成了碎片。

en: The class were divided in their opinion.
zh: 班级意见不统一。

en: The class divided into two teams.
zh: 班级分成两队。

en: Half the class say that they drink coffee.
zh: 一半的同学说他们喝咖啡。

en: There is a little wine left in the bottom of the glass.
zh: 杯底还剩一点酒。

en: Every pupil in the class is present.
zh: 班里的每个学生都到场了。

en: The number of boys in our class is thirty.
zh: 我们班的男生人数是三十个。

en: Everyone in the class has to learn the poem by heart.
zh: 班里的每个人都必须把这首诗背下来。

en: All the pupils in the class like Miss Smith.
zh: 班里的所有学生都喜欢史密斯小姐。

en: The class divided on this question.
zh: 在这个问题上，全班意见不一。

en: Smaller classes mean a higher standard of education, and that's what we want for our kids.
zh: 小班教学意味着更高的教育水平，这正是我们希望孩子们得到的。

en: The class are all here.
zh: 全班都到齐了。

en: All the boys in class worked hard.
zh: 班里所有的男生都很努力。

en: The proportion of girls to boys in our class is three to two.
zh: 我们班的女生和男生的比例是三比二。

en: I enjoy sipping on a margarita with salt around the rim.
zh: 我喜欢啜饮杯口有盐的玛格丽特。

en: Some of my classmate always make a fool of me.
zh: 我的一些同学总是捉弄我。

en: The whole class laughed at his joke.
zh: 全班都笑了他的笑话。

en: The class accepted the new teacher.
zh: 全班接受了新老师。

en: I couldn't get my idea across to the class.
zh: 我无法向全班表达我的想法。

en: Everyone in our class passed the test.
zh: 我们班的每个人都通过了考试。

en: Everyone in the class climbed the hill.
zh: 我们班的每个人都爬上了山。

en: Not all my classmate like the food in the cafeteria.
zh: 不是我所有的同学都喜欢食堂的饭菜。

en: Everyone in the class learned the poem by heart.
zh: 班里的每个人都把这首诗背下来了。

en: Almost everyone in the class voted in favor of having a thank-you party for the teachers.
zh: 几乎全班都投票赞成给老师们举办一个感谢派对。

en: No student in our class is smarter than Kate.
zh: 我们班没有学生比凯特更聪明。

en: No student in our class is as smart as Kate.
zh: 我们班没有学生像凯特一样聪明。

en: Our class has forty-five students.
zh: 我们班有四十五个学生。

en: No other boy in his class is so tall as he.
zh: 他班里没有其他男孩像他一样高。

en: No other boy in his class is as bright as he.
zh: 他班里没有其他男孩像他一样聪明。

en: No boy in the class is taller than Bill.
zh: 班里没有男生比比尔高。

en: No boy in the class is as tall as Bill.
zh: 班里没有男生和比尔一样高。

en: He is second to none in mathematics in his class.
zh: 他在班里的数学是数一数二的。

en: The class was too big so we split up into two smaller groups.
zh: 班级太大了，所以我们分成两个小组。

en: Classical music is not my cup of tea.
zh: 古典音乐不是我喜欢的类型。

en: Talking of classical music, who is your favorite composer?
zh: 说到古典音乐，你最喜欢的作曲家是谁？

en: I like classical music.
zh: 我喜欢古典音乐。

en: Some people like classical music, while others like popular music.
zh: 有些人喜欢古典音乐，而另一些人喜欢流行音乐。

en: You like classical music, don't you?
zh: 你喜欢古典音乐，不是吗？

en: I like to listen to classical music.
zh: 我喜欢听古典音乐。

en: I don't have any classical music.
zh: 我没有任何古典音乐。

en: Do you have any information on classical music concerts?
zh: 你有关于古典音乐音乐会的信息吗？

en: There was no student in the playground.
zh: 操场上没有学生。

en: I've lost my crown.
zh: 我把我的王冠弄丢了。

en: Mrs. Crouch, do you have a job?
zh: 克劳奇夫人，你有一份工作吗？

en: Is this Mr Crouch?
zh: 请问是克劳奇先生吗？

en: Mr Crouch, what do you do?
zh: 克劳奇先生，您是做什么的？

en: Miss Klein gives a test every Friday.
zh: 克莱因小姐每周五都进行一次测试。

en: Dr. Klein recommended you to me.
zh: 克莱因博士向我推荐了你。

en: Clive wants to be an electronic engineer.
zh: 克莱夫想成为一名电子工程师。

en: The glider soared high into the air.
zh: 滑翔机高高地飞向空中。

en: Dr. Clark, may I ask a favor of you?
zh: 克拉克博士，我可以请你帮个忙吗？

en: Spiders spin webs.
zh: 蜘蛛结网。

en: I abhor spiders.
zh: 我讨厌蜘蛛。

en: Spiders wait for insects to get caught in the webs. This is how they get their food.
zh: 蜘蛛等待昆虫被困在网上。这就是它们获取食物的方式。

en: There the spider waits for small insects like butterflies and dragonflies to be trapped.
zh: 蜘蛛在那里等待着蝴蝶和蜻蜓之类的小昆虫落入陷阱。

en: A spider can produce a silky substance from tiny openings on its underside.
zh: 蜘蛛可以从它腹部的小孔中产生一种丝状物质。

en: Spiders always weave their webs in three dimensions.
zh: 蜘蛛总是以三维方式编织它们的网。

en: To make a web, it starts by making a frame of this silk and fastening it to hard objects, such as trees or fences.
zh: 为了结网，它首先用这种丝做一个框架，然后把它固定在坚硬的物体上，比如树木或栅栏。

en: It's getting cloudy. It may rain soon.
zh: 天要阴了。可能很快就要下雨了。

en: Have you ever seen a spider spinning its web?
zh: 你见过蜘蛛织网吗？

en: Kumi made a box.
zh: 久美做了一个盒子。

en: Kumi did not make a box.
zh: 久美没有做一个盒子。

en: Kumi is playing tennis now.
zh: 久美现在正在打网球。

en: Kumi is the girl who likes dogs.
zh: 久美是那个喜欢狗的女孩。

en: What did Kumi make?
zh: 久美做了什么？

en: Is Kumi playing tennis?
zh: 久美在打网球吗？

en: Kumi is the girl whose father likes dogs.
zh: 久美是那个爸爸喜欢狗的女孩。

en: Kumiko got a porter to carry her suitcase at the airport.
zh: 久美子在机场请搬运工帮她搬行李箱。

en: Kumiko is as tall as Tom.
zh: 久美子和汤姆一样高。

en: Kumiko runs as fast as Tom.
zh: 久美子跑得和汤姆一样快。

en: The bear is walking up and down in the cage.
zh: 熊在笼子里来回走动。

en: Kuniko is related to Mr Nagai.
zh: 久仁子和永井先生有亲戚关系。

en: Kuniko has never drunk so much before in her life.
zh: 久仁子这辈子从来没喝过这么多。

en: It upsets me to have to listen to the same thing over and over (and over) again.
zh: 我讨厌一遍又一遍地听同样的事情。

en: Let's not go into details.
zh: 我们不要深入细节。

en: Stop bugging me with your annoying questions!
zh: 别再用你那些烦人的问题来烦我了！

en: He is dead drunk.
zh: 他喝得烂醉如泥。

en: If you are at ease, you are feeling confident and comfortable.
zh: 如果你感到放松，你就会感到自信和舒适。

en: Be relaxed and put the other person at ease.
zh: 放松，让对方也感到放松。

en: The shoes are made of leather.
zh: 这鞋是皮革做的。

en: Did you have a good sleep?
zh: 你睡得好吗？

en: He's sound asleep.
zh: 他睡得很熟。

en: I feel heaps better after a sound sleep.
zh: 好好睡一觉后，我感觉好多了。

en: A sound sleep made me feel much better.
zh: 睡个好觉让我感觉好多了。

en: I had a good night's sleep.
zh: 我睡了个好觉。

en: Sound sleep freshened him up.
zh: 熟睡使他精神焕发。

en: Sleep tight, Sean.
zh: 好好睡吧，肖恩。

en: Captain Cook thanked the natives for their hospitality.
zh: 库克船长感谢当地人款待。

en: Captain Cook discovered those islands.
zh: 库克船长发现了那些岛屿。

en: Who has eaten all the cookies?
zh: 谁把所有的饼干都吃了？

en: Would you like some of those cookies?
zh: 你想来点那些饼干吗？

en: Help yourself to these cookies.
zh: 随便吃这些饼干。

en: Cookie likes adventure stories.
zh: Cookie喜欢冒险故事。

en: Cookie turned over in his sleep.
zh: Cookie在睡梦中翻了个身。

en: The cookies are all in the form of stars.
zh: 饼干都是星星形状的。

en: Cookie is under the table.
zh: Cookie在桌子底下。

en: Cookie is younger than Kate by ten years.
zh: Cookie比凯特小十岁。

en: Cookie was raised by Kate.
zh: Cookie是凯特养大的。

en: Cookie is under 5 years old.
zh: Cookie不到5岁。

en: Cookie's house is made of wood.
zh: Cookie的房子是木头做的。

en: Cookie's house is under repair.
zh: Cookie的房子正在维修。

en: Cookie's mother died of cancer.
zh: Cookie的母亲死于癌症。

en: Cookie jumped over Kate.
zh: Cookie跳过了凯特。

en: We have had enough of empty words.
zh: 我们受够了空话。

en: The breaking waves formed foam.
zh: 破碎的波浪形成了泡沫。

en: Being exhausted, she was soon fast asleep.
zh: 由于精疲力竭，她很快就睡着了。

en: Reduce to pulp by boiling.
zh: 煮烂成浆。

en: Rats! I've got to work overtime again.
zh: 糟糕！我又得加班了。

en: Oh, just my luck!
zh: 哎，真倒霉！

en: Junk bond dealers left the market riding on a pillow of air.
zh: 垃圾债券交易商在泡沫中离开了市场。

en: The smoldering firewood burst into flame.
zh: 闷烧的木柴突然燃烧起来。

en: Cuzco is one of the most interesting places in the world.
zh: 库斯科是世界上最有趣的地方之一。

en: Cuzco lies about 3,500 meters above sea level, and you can still see many Incas there.
zh: 库斯科位于海拔约3500米的地方，你仍然可以在那里看到许多印加人。

en: I couldn't keep from snickering.
zh: 我忍不住窃笑起来。

en: Don't be long about it!
zh: 别太久！

en: There is no time to lose.
zh: 时不我待。

en: Quit lazing around and get moving!
zh: 别再懒洋洋的了，快点动起来！

en: We have little time to waste.
zh: 我们没有多少时间可以浪费了。

en: The delay forced us to stay overnight in an expensive hotel.
zh: 延误迫使我们在一家昂贵的酒店过夜。

en: Lend me your comb for a minute, will you?
zh: 借我你的梳子用一下，好吗？

en: Let's draw lots to decide who goes first.
zh: 我们抽签决定谁先来。

en: Whales come under mammals.
zh: 鲸鱼属于哺乳动物。

en: A whale is no more a fish than a horse is.
zh: 鲸鱼不是鱼，就像马不是鱼一样。

en: Whales can remain submerged for a long time.
zh: 鲸鱼可以在水下停留很长时间。

en: Whales are said to have lived on land long ago.
zh: 据说鲸鱼很久以前生活在陆地上。

en: A whale is a sort of mammal.
zh: 鲸鱼是一种哺乳动物。

en: A whale is no more a fish than a horse.
zh: 鲸鱼不是鱼，就像马不是鱼一样。

en: Hachoo! Somebody must be gossiping about me.
zh: 阿嚏！肯定有人在说我。

en: I can't stop sneezing.
zh: 我止不住地打喷嚏。

en: The peacock has a truly gorgeous tail.
zh: 孔雀的尾巴真是太漂亮了。

en: The peacock has fair feathers but foul feet.
zh: 孔雀的羽毛很美，但脚却很丑陋。

en: Let's decide the winner by lot.
zh: 我们抽签决定胜者吧。

en: I hit the jackpot.
zh: 我中大奖了。

en: We've been moping around too much. It's time to pull ourselves together and keep trying.
zh: 我们已经消沉太久了。是时候振作起来，继续努力了。

en: A nail penetrated the car tyre.
zh: 一个钉子扎进了汽车轮胎。

en: Would you put on the air conditioning?
zh: 你能打开空调吗？

en: The air conditioner has got out of order.
zh: 空调坏了。

en: The air conditioner doesn't seem to work.
zh: 空调好像不工作了。

en: Mr Koop would be the last person to take a bribe.
zh: 库普先生是最不可能受贿的人。

en: The coup attempt was foiled at the last moment.
zh: 政变企图在最后一刻被挫败了。

en: The coup was meticulously executed.
zh: 政变经过精心策划。

en: Ahhh! Feel that beer seep into every fiber of my being. Yep, nothing beats a cold one after work.
zh: 啊！感觉啤酒渗入了我身体的每一个细胞。没错，没有什么比下班后喝一杯冰镇啤酒更棒了。

en: Rock breaks scissors. Scissors cut paper. Paper smothers rock.
zh: 石头砸剪刀。剪刀剪纸。纸包石头。

en: The door yielded to a strong push.
zh: 门被用力一推就开了。

en: The quiz show follows the 7 o'clock news.
zh: 问答节目在七点新闻之后播出。

en: Kuala Lumpur is worth visiting.
zh: 吉隆坡值得一游。

en: Have you ever been to Guam?
zh: 你去过关岛吗？

en: I didn't feel well, but I went to work.
zh: 我感觉不舒服，但我还是去上班了。

en: Rev. King fell backwards, shot in the neck.
zh: 金牧师向后倒下，脖子中弹。

en: Rev. King led protests and demonstrations all over the country during the next few years.
zh: 在接下来的几年里，金牧师在全国各地领导抗议和示威活动。

en: Some of Martin Luther King's supporters began to question his belief in peaceful protests.
zh: 马丁·路德·金的一些支持者开始质疑他对和平抗议的信念。

en: Rev. King's house was destroyed by a bomb. But still, the buses went on empty.
zh: 金牧师的房子被炸弹摧毁了。但即便如此，公交车仍然空无一人。

en: Rev. King and his supporters were threatened.
zh: 金牧师和他的支持者受到了威胁。

en: Everything Rev. Martin Luther King had worked so hard for seemed lost.
zh: 马丁·路德·金辛辛苦苦为之奋斗的一切似乎都失去了。

en: I'd like to make an appointment with Dr. King.
zh: 我想预约金医生。

en: The data cited in King's research is taken from UNESCO's 1970 white paper on world population.
zh: 金的研究中引用的数据来自联合国教科文组织1970年关于世界人口的白皮书。

en: I was just in time for the last train.
zh: 我正好赶上了末班车。

en: Cleanliness is next to godliness.
zh: 清洁是仅次于神圣的美德。

en: Can you wrap these neatly for me?
zh: 你能帮我把这些包好吗？

en: You may take this book so long as you keep it clean.
zh: 只要你保持这本书干净，你就可以拿走。

en: Lovely sunset, isn't it?
zh: 多美的日落啊，不是吗？

en: Some pretty birds are flying above the trees.
zh: 一些漂亮的鸟儿在树上飞翔。

en: Pure water is necessary to our daily life.
zh: 纯净水对我们的日常生活是必需的。

en: We must be careful to drink only pure water.
zh: 我们必须小心，只喝纯净水。

en: I wish I could show you the pretty ice on the trees.
zh: 我真希望我能让你看看树上美丽的冰。

en: Bring me a clean plate and take the dirty one away.
zh: 给我拿一个干净的盘子，把脏的拿走。

en: Thank you for the beautiful flowers.
zh: 谢谢你送的美丽鲜花。

en: There were beautiful flowers on the reception desk.
zh: 接待处摆放着美丽的鲜花。

en: That's a beautiful Kabuki doll!
zh: 那是一个美丽的歌舞伎人偶！

en: That's a pretty dress you have on.
zh: 你穿的裙子真漂亮。

en: The clean towels are in the drawer.
zh: 干净的毛巾在抽屉里。

en: A pretty waitress waited on us.
zh: 一位漂亮的waitress招待了我们。

en: Mr Gilmore is so well-known as to need no introduction.
zh: 吉尔莫先生非常有名，无需介绍。

en: Mr Gilmore is not so well-known as to need no introduction.
zh: 吉尔莫先生还没有那么有名，不需要介绍。

en: Kilby applied Emmet's theory to his investigation of the referendum held in Greece in 1948.
zh: 基尔比将埃米特的理论应用于他对1948年希腊全民公投的调查。

en: Christians believe in Jesus Christ.
zh: 基督徒相信耶稣基督。

en: In the Christian faith, followers believe that there is only one God, and Jesus Christ is the Son of God.
zh: 在基督教信仰中，信徒相信只有一位上帝，耶稣基督是上帝之子。

en: Sunday is a holiday in Christian countries.
zh: 在基督教国家，星期日是假日。

en: Do you believe in Christianity?
zh: 你相信基督教吗？

en: I was never a believer of Christianity.
zh: 我从来都不信基督教。

en: Christianity and Islam are two different religions.
zh: 基督教和伊斯兰教是两种不同的宗教。

en: Christ is believed to have worked many miracles.
zh: 人们相信基督创造了很多奇迹。

en: Christ died once for all humans.
zh: 基督为全人类死了一次。

en: Christ was born in 4BC.
zh: 基督生于公元前4年。

en: Why then do you baptize if you are not the Christ, nor Elijah, nor the Prophet?
zh: 那么，如果你不是基督，也不是以利亚，也不是先知，你为什么要施洗呢？

en: I learned about Greek culture.
zh: 我学习了希腊文化。

en: The Greeks used to worship several gods.
zh: 希腊人过去崇拜好几个神。

en: The Greeks made theoretical models of geometry.
zh: 希腊人建立了几何学的理论模型。

en: Greek is difficult to learn.
zh: 希腊语很难学。

en: Greek philosophers placed value on democracy.
zh: 希腊哲学家重视民主。

en: In the Greek football game, the players on one team tried to carry a ball across a line in the other team's territory.
zh: 在希腊足球比赛中，一方的队员试图把球带过另一方领地的一条线。

en: Greeks often eat fish, too.
zh: 希腊人也经常吃鱼。

en: The Greeks used to hold a big athletic meet.
zh: 希腊人过去经常举办大型运动会。

en: It is the last straw that breaks the camel's back.
zh: 压死骆驼的最后一根稻草。

en: I just made it under the wire.
zh: 我侥幸赶上了最后期限。

en: The bright sun was shining.
zh: 阳光明媚。

en: I spring with a start.
zh: 我猛地跳了起来。

en: Today we are going to discuss this problem in terms of morality.
zh: 今天我们要从道德层面来讨论这个问题。

en: I cannot give you a definite answer today.
zh: 今天我不能给你一个明确的答复。

en: Today is Sunday.
zh: 今天是星期天。

en: It is too warm for a fire today.
zh: 今天太暖和了，不适合生火。

en: Be sure to come home early today.
zh: 今天一定要早点回家。

en: On no account must you go out today.
zh: 今天无论如何你都不能出去。

en: I cannot eat anything today.
zh: 我今天什么也吃不下。

en: It is not especially hot today.
zh: 今天不是特别热。

en: The train was almost an hour behind schedule today.
zh: 今天的火车晚点差不多一个小时。

en: I have been busy today.
zh: 我今天一直很忙。

en: The eight o'clock bus was early today.
zh: 今天八点的公共汽车早到了。

en: Were there any interesting topics in today's history class?
zh: 今天的历史课有什么有趣的话题吗？

en: High tide is at 3 p.m. today.
zh: 今天下午三点是涨潮。

en: She's much better today than yesterday.
zh: 她今天比昨天好多了。

en: How was today's game?
zh: 今天的比赛怎么样？

en: I'm going to go to the doctor this afternoon.
zh: 我今天下午要去看医生。

en: Did you have a good time this afternoon?
zh: 你今天下午玩得开心吗？

en: We will have an English test this afternoon.
zh: 我们今天下午要进行英语考试。

en: Let me show you around the town this afternoon.
zh: 今天下午我带你四处逛逛这个城镇。

en: I'll miss the English class today.
zh: 我今天会错过英语课。

en: How many brothers and sisters do you have?
zh: 你有几个兄弟姐妹？

en: Today is the fatal day that they will attempt their escape.
zh: 今天他们将尝试逃脱，这是决定命运的一天。

en: A cucumber is related to a watermelon.
zh: 黄瓜和西瓜有亲缘关系。

en: Younger Cubans tend to tune into the American television network.
zh: 古巴年轻人往往会收看美国电视网络。

en: You've got to give up gambling once and for all.
zh: 你必须彻底戒赌。

en: You might as well throw your money away as spend it on gambling.
zh: 你把钱花在赌博上，还不如把钱扔掉。

en: Once you get the taste for gambling, it's hard to give it up.
zh: 一旦你尝到了赌博的滋味，就很难戒掉。

en: Gambling was by no means his only source of income.
zh: 赌博绝不是他唯一的收入来源。

en: Could you show me the campus?
zh: 你能带我参观一下校园吗？

en: Oil on canvas can never paint a petal so delicate.
zh: 油画永远无法描绘出如此精致的花瓣。

en: You must not eat so much candy.
zh: 你不能吃这么多糖。

en: Can we go to the shops for sweets, please?
zh: 我们可以去商店买糖果吗？

en: Apparently there's a cancellation charge of 30 percent.
zh: 看来要收取百分之三十的取消费。

en: If I wait, what's the possibility I can get a seat?
zh: 如果我等一下，我能得到座位的可能性有多大？

en: Could you put my name on the waiting list?
zh: 你能把我的名字加到等候名单上吗？

en: Only if there's a cancellation, and that would be a bolt out of the blue.
zh: 只有在有人取消的情况下才有可能，但这简直是意外之喜。

en: Among the gangsters he went by Dan.
zh: 在黑帮里，他叫丹。

en: Gangsters robbed a bank of thousands of dollars.
zh: 黑帮分子抢劫了一家银行，抢走了数千美元。

en: Carol couldn't choke back her tears.
zh: 卡罗尔忍不住流下了眼泪。

en: Carol will visit Miami next month.
zh: 卡罗尔下个月将访问迈阿密。

en: Carol will have left for London by eight tomorrow.
zh: 明天八点之前，卡罗尔就应该已经出发去伦敦了。

en: Carol gets up early every morning.
zh: 卡罗尔每天早上都很早起床。

en: Carol has a nose for the best Thai cooking anywhere in town.
zh: 卡罗尔对城里最好的泰国菜非常了解。

en: Carol visited Boston last month.
zh: 卡罗尔上个月访问了波士顿。

en: Carol refused; in other words her answer was "no."
zh: 卡罗尔拒绝了；换句话说，她的回答是“不”。

en: Carol is driving a rent-a-car.
zh: 卡罗尔开着租来的车。

en: Carol studies very hard. So does Henry.
zh: 卡罗尔学习非常努力。亨利也是。

en: Carol often watches horror movies.
zh: 卡罗尔经常看恐怖电影。

en: Carol returned to her hotel.
zh: 卡罗尔回到了她的酒店。

en: Carol has just returned to her hotel.
zh: 卡罗尔刚刚回到她的酒店。

en: Carol is studying Spanish.
zh: 卡罗尔正在学习西班牙语。

en: Carol has been studying Spanish for three years.
zh: 卡罗尔已经学了三年西班牙语了。

en: Carol lives in Chicago.
zh: 卡罗尔住在芝加哥。

en: I heard that Carol and Will have split up.
zh: 我听说卡罗尔和威尔分手了。

en: The maid had already cleaned the room when Carol walked in.
zh: 当卡罗尔走进房间时，女佣已经打扫干净了。

en: Caroline knows better than to spend all her money on clothes.
zh: 卡罗琳很清楚不应该把所有的钱都花在衣服上。

en: The price of cabbage fell because of overproduction.
zh: 由于生产过剩，卷心菜的价格下跌了。

en: The captain commanded silence.
zh: 船长命令保持安静。

en: Cabbage can be eaten raw.
zh: 卷心菜可以生吃。

en: The captain appealed to the referee against the decision.
zh: 船长就判决向裁判提出申诉。

en: Our captain got sick, so I attended the meeting in his place.
zh: 我们的船长生病了，所以我代替他参加了会议。

en: A cabinet is a cupboard used for displaying things.
zh: 橱柜是用来展示物品的柜子。

en: Don't play catch.
zh: 不要玩抛接球。

en: Let's play catch.
zh: 我们来玩抛接球吧。

en: He said to me, 'Let's play catch.'
zh: 他对我说：“我们来玩抛接球吧。”

en: Cathy devoted herself to her sick mother.
zh: 凯西全身心照顾她生病的母亲。

en: Kathy got a part-time job so that she could study at college.
zh: 凯西找了一份兼职工作，这样她就可以上大学了。

en: Cathy stopped picking flowers.
zh: 凯西停止摘花了。

en: Cathy, please stay out of my way for a while.
zh: 凯西，请暂时别挡我的路。

en: Did Cathy go, too?
zh: 凯西也去了吗？

en: Cathy had her hat blown away.
zh: 凯西的帽子被风吹走了。

en: Cathy has a hot temper.
zh: 凯西脾气很暴躁。

en: Kathy is gazing at the stars.
zh: 凯西正在凝视星星。

en: It seems that Cathy likes music.
zh: 看来凯西喜欢音乐。

en: Cathy can speak French and German.
zh: 凯西会说法语和德语。

en: Cathy is coming to see our baby tonight.
zh: 凯西今晚要来看我们的宝宝。

en: Do you remember what Kathy had on at the party?
zh: 你还记得凯西在聚会上穿了什么吗？

en: Kathleen's statements turned out to be true.
zh: 凯瑟琳的陈述结果证明是真的。

en: Stop making a fuss.
zh: 别吵了。

en: Catherine had an ulterior motive when she urged her father to buy a new car. She hoped that she'd be able to drive it herself.
zh: 凯瑟琳怂恿她父亲买新车另有隐情。她希望自己也能开。

en: Oh, I lost the data!
zh: 哦，我丢失了数据！

en: The rough material hurt the child's tender skin.
zh: 粗糙的材料伤害了孩子娇嫩的皮肤。
